mapper.insert: insert into private_diary.pd_diary(user_id, diary_title, diary_weather, diary_mood, diary_event, diary_location, diary_content, diary_photo, diary_create_time, diary_update_time, diary_longitude, diary_latitude, diary_create_day) value (#{userId}, #{diaryTitle}, #{diaryWeather}, #{diaryMood}, #{diaryEvent}, #{diaryLocation}, #{diaryContent}, #{diaryPhoto}, #{diaryCreateTime}, #{diaryUpdateTime}, #{diaryLongitude}, #{diaryLatitude}, #{diaryCreateDay})
mapper.select: from private_diary.pd_diary where user_id = #{userId} and diary_id = #{diaryId}
from private_diary.pd_diary where user_id = #{userId} and diary_id = #{diaryId}

select count(DISTINCT diary_create_day) as recordDays, count(diary_id) as diaryTotal, sum(CHAR_LENGTH(diary_content)) as wordsTotal, count(diary_photo) as photoTotal, count(diary_location) as addressTotal from private_diary.pd_diary where user_id = #{userId}

select diary_weather as weather, diary_mood as mood, diary_event as event, diary_longitude as longitude, diary_latitude as latitude, diary_photo as photo, diary_id as diaryId from private_diary.pd_diary where user_id = #{userId}
select count(diary_id) from private_diary.pd_diary where diary_location != '' and user_id = #{userId}
select diary_longitude as longitude, diary_latitude as latitude, diary_id as diaryId from private_diary.pd_diary where diary_location != '' and user_id = #{userId}
select diary_id as diaryId, diary_photo as imgUrl from private_diary.pd_diary where diary_photo != '' and user_id = #{userId}
select diary_weather as label, count(*) as times from private_diary.pd_diary where user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY diary_weather order by times desc
